name: Charles Bukowski caricature
description: I made this caricature of Bukowski thinking about the portraits of the Baroque period such as those of Velazquez or Rembrandt since the lighting of the photo on which I was based lent itself to that, trying as always to capture the essence of his expression, exaggerating his features without arrive at the deformation but rather by stylizing the forms. Its measurements are: 4063 x 5478. It is digital painting (photoshop)
